DataElement.preferredName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Patient PRL0707 Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the type of eligibility criteria needed for PEARL study 0707 as related to the elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial of a person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment in a clinical trial supported by the Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network (PEARL), an infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Patient Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial of a person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment in a clinical trial supported by the Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network (PEARL), an infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Patient
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.:A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.longName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network
Concepts.definition: An infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: PRL0707 Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Type
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the type of eligibility criteria needed for PEARL study 0707.

PermissibleValues.value: Is the subject able to follow the study protocol and willing to return for all evaluation appointments
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Is the subject able to follow the study protocol and willing to return for all evaluation appointments

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Is the subject able to follow the study protocol and willing to return for all evaluation appointments
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Is the subject able to follow the study protocol and willing to return for all evaluation appointments

PermissibleValues.value: Do teeth have mobility of <1 mm when manipulated between blunt instruments
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Do teeth have mobility of <1 mm when manipulated between blunt instruments

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Do teeth have mobility of <1 mm when manipulated between blunt instruments
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Do teeth have mobility of <1 mm when manipulated between blunt instruments

PermissibleValues.value: Are teeth free of mesial, distal, or buccal restorations (to avoid confounding hypersensitivity
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Are teeth free of mesial, distal, or buccal restorations (to avoid confounding hypersensitivity

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Are teeth free of mesial, distal, or buccal restorations (to avoid confounding hypersensitivity
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Are teeth free of mesial, distal, or buccal restorations (to avoid confounding hypersensitivity

PermissibleValues.value: Does the subject have a premolar or first molar with an NCL and hypersensitivity of >=3 as indicated by the subject on the Numeric Pain Assessment Scale (2008 NCCN) with standardized air blast simulation with no other tooth exhibiting hypersensitivity
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Does the subject have a premolar or molar with an NCL and hypersensitivity of >=3 as indicated by the subject on the Numeric Pain Assessment Scale (2008 NCCN) with standardized air blast simulation with no adjacent teeth exhibiting hypersensitivity

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Does the subject have a premolar or molar with an NCL and hypersensitivity of >=3 as indicated by the subject on the Numeric Pain Assessment Scale (2008 NCCN) with standardized air blast simulation with no adjacent teeth exhibiting hypersensitivity
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Does the subject have a premolar or molar with an NCL and hypersensitivity of >=3 as indicated by the subject on the Numeric Pain Assessment Scale (2008 NCCN) with standardized air blast simulation with no adjacent teeth exhibiting hypersensitivity

PermissibleValues.value: Does the NCL have a depth of at least 1mm as measured by placing a perio-probe (e.g.) into the deepest part of the lesion
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Does the NCL have a depth of at least 1mm as measured by placing a perio-probe (e.g.) into the deepest part of the lesion

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Does the NCL have a depth of at least 1mm as measured by placing a perio-probe (e.g.) into the deepest part of the lesion
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Does the NCL have a depth of at least 1mm as measured by placing a perio-probe (e.g.) into the deepest part of the lesion

PermissibleValues.value: Is the subject willing and able to understand and sign the informed consent form
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Is the subject willing and able to understand and sign the informed consent form and for individuals under that age of 18, the parental/guardian assent form

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Is the subject willing and able to understand and sign the informed consent form and for individuals under that age of 18, the parental/guardian assent form
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Is the subject willing and able to understand and sign the informed consent form and for individuals under that age of 18, the parental/guardian assent form

PermissibleValues.value: Is the patient 18 years of age or older
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Is the patient 18 years of age or older

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Is the patient 18 years of age or older
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Is the patient 18 years of age or older
